H0.text: Moon is the Sun, which is the largest body in the solar system.

H1.text: Planet is what the Sun is, since the Sun is the largest body in the solar system.

H2.text: Satellite is the Sun, which is the largest body in the solar system.

H3.text: Star is the Sun, the largest body in the solar system.

A4.text: The Sun is a G-type main-sequence star (G2V), informally called a yellow dwarf, though its light is actually white.

A5.text: The Sun is a G-type main-sequence star that makes up about 99.86% of the mass of the Solar System.
